0011101011010110 1110111101100001 0 -> sum: 0010101000110111, cout: 1
1010111101010000 0100110110001100 1 -> sum: 1111110011011101, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
